title: thornmail
body: okay srsly we need to buff this item cause jesus christ first of all single target spell count towards the damage reflect and second of all the 15% damage done return thing.. how about bump it up to 50%?

replies.body: Stop for a minute and think about how broken 50% pre-mitigation damage return would be. Assuming you can do basic math.
stop for a moment and think off how much thornmail currently does

Let me clarify this for you, since you seem too heavily salted to do basic math.

Lets say we have a typical tank with something like {{item:3742}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3075}} {{item:3078}} 
That would put them around 240-270 armor and 2500 HP.

This equals 8750 effective HP, assuming 250 armor and not counting penetration, which most adcs have little of currently.
For fun, lets add 35% armor pen, for 6562.5 effective HP.

An ADC attempting to kill this tank is going to take 3281.25 magic damage just from thornmail, which will inevitably kill them without the tank even needing to move or attack, unless they stack magic resist, thus making themselves useless.

Most ADCs are not going to have that much armor pen for most of the game, so they will take even more damage. And this is not considering tanks with even higher hp and armor.

Tanks are already broken in the current meta, this would just make thornmail a must-buy item, corki and miss fortune 100% pick/bans, and assassins utterly useless. Remember early season 6..?
the whole point of thornmail is if you attack me you gonna take damage and well that whole return damage part currently is not being shown what so ever
50% seems like a ton, so no on that; maybe 25% on basics or 15% of **ALL** physical damage :O.  **However**, thornmail is pretty weak and useless for the price.
